```{r Libraries, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# rm(list = ls())

root.dir <- rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file()

# libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(tidybayes)
library(bayesplot)
library(loo)
library(ggdist)
library(flextable)
library(scales) 
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(cmdstanr)
set_cmdstan_path(path = "C:/Users/bcalvo/.cmdstan/cmdstan-2.36.0")

```

```{r Load data,  message=FALSE}

## Load data

d <- readRDS(file = paste0(root.dir, "/Data/clean_data.rds"))

```

```{r Exploratory plots}

palette_sex <- c("#0D0887FF","#F89441FF" )

ggplot(data = d, aes(x = line_f, y = velocity_diff, fill = sex_f, color=sex_f)) +
  theme_bw()+
  geom_boxplot(outliers=F, alpha=0.5) +
  geom_point(position=position_jitterdodge())+
  scale_fill_viridis_d("Sex", option = "plasma", end = 0.8, labels = c("Male", "Female")) +
  scale_colour_manual("Sex", values=palette_sex, labels = c("Male", "Female"))  + 
  theme(axis.line = element_line(colour = "black"),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        panel.background = element_blank()) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom", 
        legend.background =element_blank(), 
        legend.key.size = unit(0.5,"line"), 
        legend.title=element_text(size=12),
        legend.text=element_text(size=10)) +
  labs(x = "\n Line", y ="Difference in velocity (cm/s)\n(cat zone - non-cat zone)\n")

ggsave(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Graphs/EDA/velocity_diff.png"), width = 5, height = 4)

# Remove data
rm(palette_sex)

```

```{r Round effect}

## Check round effect by line (Control and WT) and sex

## Data
d_round_control <- d[d$line_f %in% c("Control"),]
d_round_control$line_f <- factor(d_round_control$line_f)
d_round_control_m <- d_round_control[d_round_control$sex == "Male",]
d_round_control_f <- d_round_control[d_round_control$sex == "Female",]

d_round_w <- d[d$line_f %in% c("WT"),]
d_round_w$line_f <- factor(d_round_w$line_f)
d_round_w_m <- d_round_w[d_round_w$sex == "Male",]
d_round_w_f <- d_round_w[d_round_w$sex == "Female",]

## Models

## Control Males

# Null model
m_null <- brm(
  bf(velocity_diff ~ 1),
  data = d_round_control_m,
  family = student,
  chains = 4, iter = 2000, warmup = 1000,
  cores = 4, seed = 1234,
  save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE),
  backend = "cmdstanr",
  file = paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Round/velocity_diff_round_control_m0")
)
#plot(m_null)
summary(m_null)

# Round model
m_round <- brm(
  bf(velocity_diff ~ -1 + round_f),  
  data = d_round_control_m,
  family = student,
  chains = 4, iter = 2000, warmup = 1000,
  cores = 4, seed = 1234,
  save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE),
  backend = "cmdstanr",
  file = paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Round/velocity_diff_round_control_m1")
)
#plot(m_round)
summary(m_round)

# Reload models
m_null <- readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Round/velocity_diff_round_control_m0.rds"))
m_round <- readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Round/velocity_diff_round_control_m1.rds"))

# Compare models
m_null <- add_criterion(m_null, "loo")#, moment_match = TRUE) 
m_round <- add_criterion(m_round, "loo", moment_match = TRUE) 
loo_compare(m_null, m_round) %>% print(simplify = F)
```

```{r EXC-INC models}

## Models and model comparison: there are no outliers

# Null model 
m_null <- brm(
  bf(velocity_diff ~ 1),
  data = d,
  family = student,
  chains = 4, iter = 2000, warmup = 1000,
  cores = 4, seed = 1234,
  save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE),
  backend = "cmdstanr",
  file = paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m0")
)
#plot(m_null)
summary(m_null)

# Line model 
m_line <- brm(
  bf(velocity_diff ~ 1 + line_f),
  data = d,
  family = student,
  chains = 4, iter = 2000, warmup = 1000,
  cores = 4, seed = 1234,
  save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE),
  backend = "cmdstanr",
  file = paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m1")
)
#plot(m_line)
summary(m_line)

# Sex model
m_sex <- brm(
  bf(velocity_diff ~ 1 +  sex_f),  
  data = d,
  family = student,
  chains = 4, iter = 2000, warmup = 1000,
  cores = 4, seed = 1234,
  save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE),
  backend = "cmdstanr",
  file = paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m2")
)
#plot(m_sex)
summary(m_sex)

# Sex interaction model
m_int <- brm(
  bf(velocity_diff ~ 1 + line_f * sex_f),  
  data = d,
  family = student,
  chains = 4, iter = 2000, warmup = 1000,
  cores = 4, seed = 1234,
  save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE),
  backend = "cmdstanr",
  file = paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m3")
)
#plot(m_int)
summary(m_int)

# Line + sex model
m_line_sex <- brm(
  bf(velocity_diff ~ 1 + line_f + sex_f),  
  data = d,
  family = student,
  chains = 4, iter = 2000, warmup = 1000,
  cores = 4, seed = 1234,
  save_pars = save_pars(all = TRUE),
  backend = "cmdstanr",
  file = paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m4")
)
#plot(m_line_sex)
summary(m_line_sex)

## Load all models
m_null <- readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m0.rds"))
m_line <- readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m1.rds"))
m_sex <- readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m2.rds"))
m_int <- readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m3.rds"))
m_line_sex <- readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m4.rds"))

## Compare models and model selection
m_null <- add_criterion(m_null, "loo", moment_match = TRUE) 
m_line <- add_criterion(m_line, "loo", moment_match = TRUE) 
m_sex <- add_criterion(m_sex, "loo", moment_match = TRUE) 
m_int <- add_criterion(m_int, "loo", moment_match = TRUE) 
m_line_sex <- add_criterion(m_line_sex, "loo", moment_match = TRUE) 
loo_compare(m_null, m_line, m_sex, m_int, m_line_sex) %>% print(simplify = F)

# Remove data
rm(m_null, m_line, m_sex, m_int, m_line_sex)

```

```{r EXC-INC output}

## Generate model output for selected model: there were no outliers

# Reload model
m_velocity_diff <- readRDS(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Output/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m1.rds"))

# Predict values 
newdata <- expand.grid(line_f = unique(d$line_f))

beta_bayes_pred <- m_velocity_diff %>% 
  epred_draws(newdata = newdata)  

# Factor
beta_bayes_pred$line_f <- factor(beta_bayes_pred$line_f, levels = c("Control", "WT", "TgTH0", "TgTH-MID", "TgTH-HIGH"),
                                 labels = c("Control", "WT", "TgTH0", "TgTH-MID", "TgTH-HIGH"))
# Generate plot
ggplot(beta_bayes_pred, aes(x = .epred, y = fct_rev(line_f), fill = line_f)) +
  theme_bw() +
  stat_halfeye(.width = c(0.95), point_interval = "mean_qi") +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "plasma", end = 0.8) +
  guides(fill = "none") +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  labs(x = "Difference in velocity (cm/s) (cat zone - non-cat zone)", y = NULL) 

ggsave(paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Graphs/Model_exc/velocity_diff_m1_EXC_INC.png"), width = 5, height = 3)

# Generate table
beta_bayes_pred_table <- m_velocity_diff %>% 
  epred_draws(newdata = newdata)  %>% mean_qi() %>% select(line_f, .epred, .lower, .upper) %>% 
  rename_with(~c("Line", "Mean", "95% CI lower limit", "95% CI upper limit")) %>% mutate(across(2:4, round, 3))
flextable(beta_bayes_pred_table) %>% save_as_docx( path = paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Tables/velocity_diff_m1_EXC_INC.docx"))


# Create contrasts
t <- beta_bayes_pred %>%
  dplyr::ungroup() %>%
  dplyr::select(-.row) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "line_f", values_from = ".epred") %>%
  mutate(`Control_TgTH0` = `Control` - `TgTH0`,
         `Control_TgTH-MID` = `Control` - `TgTH-MID`,
         `Control_TgTH-HIGH` = `Control` - `TgTH-HIGH`,
         `TgTH0_TgTH-MID` = `TgTH0` - `TgTH-MID`,
         `TgTH0_TgTH-HIGH` = `TgTH0` - `TgTH-HIGH`,
         `TgTH-MID_TgTH-HIGH` = `TgTH-MID` - `TgTH-HIGH`,
         `WT_Control` = `WT` - `Control`,
         `WT_TgTH0` = `WT` - `TgTH0`,
         `WT_TgTH-MID` = `WT` - `TgTH-MID`,
         `WT_TgTH-HIGH` = `WT` - `TgTH-HIGH`,) %>%
  pivot_longer(!c(.chain, .iteration, .draw), names_to = "key", values_to = "epred") %>%
  filter(key %in% c("Control_TgTH0", "Control_TgTH-MID", "Control_TgTH-HIGH",
                    "WT_Control",
                    "TgTH0_TgTH-MID", "TgTH0_TgTH-HIGH", "TgTH-MID_TgTH-HIGH",
                    "WT_TgTH0", "WT_TgTH-MID", "WT_TgTH-HIGH")) %>%
  mutate(key = factor(key, levels = c("Control_TgTH0", "Control_TgTH-MID", "Control_TgTH-HIGH",
                                      "TgTH0_TgTH-MID", "TgTH0_TgTH-HIGH", "TgTH-MID_TgTH-HIGH",
                                      "WT_Control", "WT_TgTH0", "WT_TgTH-MID", "WT_TgTH-HIGH"),
                      labels = c("Control - TgTH0", "Control - TgTH-MID", "Control - TgTH-HIGH",
                                 "TgTH0 - TgTH-MID", "TgTH0 - TgTH-HIGH", "TgTH-MID - TgTH-HIGH",
                                 "WT - Control", "WT - TgTH0", "WT - TgTH-MID", "WT - TgTH-HIGH")
                      ))  %>%
  group_by(key) %>%   mean_qi(epred) %>% 
  select(key, epred, .lower, .upper) %>% 
  rename_with(~c("Lines", "Mean", "95% CI lower limit", "95% CI upper limit")) %>% mutate(across(2:4, round, 3))

flextable(t) %>% save_as_docx( path = paste0(root.dir, "/Results/Tables/velocity_diff_m1_EXC_INC_contrasts.docx"))

rm(beta_bayes_pred, beta_bayes_pred_table, m_velocity_diff, newdata, t)

```
